schedule_appointment.info: Enable patients to schedule appointments effortlessly through an automated call, reducing staff workload and wait times

reschedule_appointment.info: Allow patients to reschedule appointments with ease, improving scheduling flexibility and clinic efficiency.

quincy.infoText1: To give a realistic experience, we need you to fill out this information. This information are nessecary to built a special and customized response to the patient.
quincy.infoText2: Depending on your clinic setup you can have different scenarios of how to work with your patients. You can also select a preset, that controls the voice and type of additional information available to Quincy.
quincy.title: Quincy Setup

quincyDemo.contractRequestedInfo: We will reach out to you shortly!
quincyDemo.innerBoxText2: Call this number from the phone you used to register and see it working
quincyDemo.title: Quincy demo

audioDemo.subtitle: Quincy is an intelligent phone assistant specifically designed to help medical practices manage and respond to calls. Through automated call answering, call routing, appointment booking, and handling simple queries, Quincy ensures your practice is always accessible while saving valuable time.
audioDemo.title: What it Quincy AI?

costSave.subtitle: Cost Savings
costSave.text: Quincy reduces the need for extra phone staff, helping you optimize resources.

moreTime.subtitle: More time for patients
moreTime.text: By automating calls and appointment scheduling, your staff can focus more on direct patient care

timeSave.subtitle: Time Savings
timeSave.text: With better accessibility and faster response times, you can attract more patients and grow your practice over time.

yourBenefits.subtitle: How does your patients reach out to you and what are the activities involved in this process.
yourBenefits.title: How Quincy benefits your Practice in the long run

bookYourDemo.info: Why wait until your competitors take the leap? Experience how Quincy can streamline your practice and give you the competitive edge—before it’s too late.
bookYourDemo.titlePart1: Don’t Wait Until Your Competitors Are Ahead

setUpPhone.text: Redirect a clinic number to Quincy provided number and see it in actiony
setUpPhone.title: Setup a phone redirect

setUpSystem.text: Connect to your PVS, or control the calendars and doctor availability manually
setUpSystem.title: Set up the system

testIt.text: Review that system works correct for you and that you like the outcome
testIt.title: Test it

easySetting.subtitle: How does your patients reach out to you and what are the activities involved in this process.
easySetting.title: Connecting Quincy AI is simple

relieveYourTeam.info: Quincy takes the phone stress off your hands, so you can focus on what matters most.
relieveYourTeam.subtitle: Boost Efficiency with Quincy, the AI Phone Assistant!
relieveYourTeam.title: Relieve Your Team
